scripts.prepare:goerli: mustache configs/goerli.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npx graph codegen
scripts.prepare:arbitrum-goerli: mustache configs/arbitrum-goerli.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npx graph codegen
scripts.prepare:polygon-mumbai: mustache configs/polygon-mumbai.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npx graph codegen
scripts.prepare:polygon-mainnet: mustache configs/polygon-mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npx graph codegen
scripts.prepare:aurora: mustache configs/aurora.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npx graph codegen
scripts.deploy:goerli: npm run prepare:goerli && npx graph deploy endemic-nft/endemic-goerli --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/
scripts.deploy:aurora: npm run prepare:aurora && npx graph deploy endemic-nft/endemic-aurora --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/
scripts.deploy:aurora-staging: npm run prepare:aurora && npx graph deploy endemic-nft/endemic-aurora-staging --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/
scripts.deploy:arbitrum-goerli: npm run prepare:arbitrum-goerli && npx graph deploy endemic-nft/endemic-arbitrum-goerli --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/
scripts.deploy:polygon-mumbai: npm run prepare:polygon-mumbai && npx graph deploy endemic-nft/endemic-polygon-mumbai --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/
scripts.deploy:polygon-mainnet: npm run prepare:polygon-mainnet && npx graph deploy endemic-nft/endemic-polygon --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/
